attributes.action: encourage and lobby the BBC to reinstate Moira Stuart as a flagship news reader or primetime presenter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following the shocking decision to sack Moira Stuart from the BBC, we seek to raise the profile of her case and have her reinstated. So BBC execs, take note; the nation loves and adores Moira and will not accept this decision lying down.
